description: The initiative, Santo Aroma, focuses on transforming cocoa into high-quality chocolate products, providing farmers with a sustainable alternative to traditional coffee cultivation. Shifting from coffee to cocoa due to climate challenges, the project emphasizes local production, artisanal methods, and community engagement. By participating in fairs and leveraging family expertise, Santo Aroma aims to enhance visibility and market reach, promoting healthy chocolate options while supporting the local economy.
name: Santo Aroma
